name: ChartTrendline
description: This object represents the attributes for a chart trendline object.

properties.name: backwardPeriod
properties.description: Represents the number of periods that the trendline extends backward.

properties.name: showEquation
properties.description: True if the equation for the trendline is displayed on the chart.

properties.name: showRSquared
properties.description: True if the R-squared for the trendline is displayed on the chart.

properties.name: format
properties.description: Represents the formatting of a chart trendline.

properties.name: intercept
properties.description: Represents the intercept value of the trendline. Can be set to a numeric value or an empty string (for automatic values). The returned value is always a number.

properties.name: forwardPeriod
properties.description: Represents the number of periods that the trendline extends forward.

properties.name: movingAveragePeriod
properties.description: Represents the period of a chart trendline. Only applicable for trendline with MovingAverage type.

properties.name: name
properties.description: Represents the name of the trendline. Can be set to a string value, or can be set to null value represents automatic values. The returned value is always a string

properties.name: polynomialOrder
properties.description: Represents the order of a chart trendline. Only applicable for trendline with Polynomial type.

properties.name: type
properties.description: Represents the type of a chart trendline.

properties.name: label
properties.description: Represents the label of a chart trendline.
